title: Contributing to Open Source: Another One
description: You know how to make an open source contribution now! Try contributing to another open source project.

validation_fields.name: repositoryOwner
validation_fields.label: Enter the username of the group that owns the repository you contributed to here!

validation_fields.name: repository
validation_fields.label: Enter the name of the repository you contributed to here!

validation_fields.name: prNumber
validation_fields.label: Enter the number of the pull request you create here!
